listitem.para: Edit /etc/quantum/quantum.conf file and modify :core_plugin = \ quantum.plugins.openvswitch.ovs_quantum_plugin.OVSQuantumPluginV2 auth_strategy = keystone fake_rabbit = False rabbit_host = 192.168.0.1 rabbit_password = password
Start Open-vSwitch service & restart the agent :/etc/init.d/openvswitch-switch start restart quantum-plugin-openvswitch-agent

Edit /etc/quantum/plugins/openvswitch/ovs_quantum_plugin.ini file and modify :[DATABASE] sql_connection = mysql://quantum:password@192.168.0.1:3306/quantum [OVS] tenant_network_type = gre tunnel_id_ranges = 1:1000 integration_bridge = br-int tunnel_bridge = br-tun local_ip = 10.0.0.2 enable_tunneling = True
Edit /etc/quantum/api-paste.ini file and modify :admin_tenant_name = service admin_user = quantum admin_password = password
